Notes.Text:
This update for libjpeg-turbo fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2020-13790: Fixed a heap-based buffer over-read via a malformed PPM input file (bsc#1172491).
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: libjpeg-turbo 2.0.4, and mozjpeg 4.0.0, has a heap-based buffer over-read in get_rgb_row() in rdppm.c via a malformed PPM input file.
